kpi.name: M8013C16

kpi_info.title: eNB initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE due to Other causes
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated transitions from the ECM-CONNECTED to ECM-IDLE state due to Other causes than "User Inactivity", "Redirect" or "Radio Connection Lost". UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME. The counter is updated if the use case does not match "User Inactivity", "Redirect" and "Lost Radio Connection".

kpi.kpi_alias: eNB initiated transitions to ECM-IDLE due to Other causes
